The parameter response_type is missing or the response_type is illegal.
Authorization is missing in the http head.
The parameter grant_type is missing or the grant_type is illegal.
Callback address is illegal, for common reasons, please see: Callback address common problems and modification methods
HTTP request is not post method.

access token has expired. The token expiration time is 3 months. If the stored access token expires, please go through the login process again, and obtain the Access_Token according to the authorization_Code or the Implicit_Grant method to obtain the Access_Token to obtain the new access token value.

access token is abolished. The token is recycled or deleted by the user. Please go through the login process again, and obtain the new access token value according to using Authorization_Code to obtain Access_Token or using Implicit_Grant to obtain Access_Token.
Failed to exchange code for access token value.
code is reused. The code is one-time effective, and the developer should guide the user to log in and authorize again at this time, and obtain the code again instead of retrying the token interface
Failed to obtain the access token value.
Failed to obtain refresh token value.
Failed to obtain the permission list of the app.
Failed to obtain the permission list of a certain OpenID for a certain appid.
Get all api information and all group information.
Failed to set user authorization api list for a certain app.
Failed to set the user authorization time for an app.
The user did not authorize the api, or the user deleted the permission of the api on the Tencent side. Please go through the login and authorization process again to authorize the api.
The third-party application does not have permission to operate this api. Please send an email to apply for OpenAPI permission.
Overload, can be used when it is not subdivided at first.
The user is not logged in.
Wrong sign, Md5 verification failed, the requested signature is inconsistent with the signature filled in on the official website
The user password change token is invalid.
OPENID decryption failed, usually because openid and appid do not match.
The debug mode is not authorized.
APPID does not have permission to obtain paytoken and openid
ip does not have permission to obtain user login information

ip does not have permission to use the interface

Failed to obtain application authorization information
